input.sentences: a group of friends getting ready for the night out on the town . they are looking to have fun | and are ready to party .
the group heads to dinner for some food and drinks . they are still anxiously loving the night .
our main couple stops to take a pic for the camera .
a couple of the friends pose for another picture as they are having a very good time .
finally | our main couple still looking delighted after a wonderful evening | and eagerly await the next one .
output.sentences: They're ready to party in town
It's going to be a fun night out
Everybody stops to take a picture
